extendedInfo.description: "Extended Controls is a great app. By far the most useful widget I have ever used" (computersight.com)"Whatâs in a name? Everything. Extended Controls is definitely the best settings widget app that I have come across and there are quite a few available at the moment" (appstorm.net)"None of the other apps have as many functions and options as Extended Controls. The long list of widgets, the amount of various designs and its user friendliness make Extended Controls a real must-have!" (androidpit.com)-----Extended controls is THE MUST HAVE APP for every Android user. It provides a totally customizable widgets, many advanced settings for any widget (more than 30 toggles each).Extended Controls provides user-friendly graphic interface and a easy configuration manager.With its features user can customize his widgets and he can beautify your fantastic Android smartphone.Extended Controls improve your batterylife using an innovative feature called "Battery saver". It's only app on Market that do this!Features:Custom backgrounds (from your gallery or download a set of backgrounds from the web);Widgets transparency;A lot of different icons;Edit existing widgets;Direct Home shortcuts; Customizable colors & labels;On/Off dividers;Honeycomb and all tablets supported (featured on Asus EEE Pad Transformer);Different widgets size (over 10 toggle for any single widget);Different indicator type (standard or circular)Clock WidgetSystem Info Widget (RAM, CPU, Network, ext-memory, etc.)Notification Widget (like Samsung Galaxy S and S2)Advanced features:Widgets sliders with double arrow, to beautify your home screen;Widgets controller on App Drawer (Extended Controls -> Widget option);Active widgets in notification bar (only Honeycomb);Stack Widgets list on Honeycomb;Widgets in notification bar;Possibility to remove widgets size from android menu;Disable static indicator;Widget preview of your widget on configuration activity;Share your widgets with main social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Google+, etc.)Profiles mode:Save your widgets and load it whenever you want!!!!As we know Android provides a widget that allows you to enable or disable these settings: WiFi,Bluetooth,GPS,Sync,Brightness.With Extended Controls, Android Power Widget can be improved allowing users to add main settings:- 2G-3G- 4G (WiMAX only for EVO)- APN (Rename APN, Direct Mode or Settings Shortcut)- Wifi (with indicator label)- Bluetooth- Brightness (High customization, with custom seekbar, label percentage, native mode)- GPS- Auto Sync- Auto Rotate- Fly Mode- SD Scanner- Silent Mode- Vibration Mode- Timeout- Stay Awake toggle- Flashlight (Torch) available on (Nexus One, Samsung Galaxy S, HTC Desire, HTC Legend, Sony Ericsson X10mini, Sony Ericsson X10, Motorola DroidX, Motorola Droid, Milestone, Verizon, Mobile, Nexus S, Galaxy Ace, Fascinate, LG Optimus, Atrix, Arc, Samsung Galaxy S2, Motorola Photon, Motorola Droid3, Motorola Xoom, Galaxy Tab, HTC Desire HD, HTC Desire S, HTC Thunderbolt, Galaxy Nexus and others)- Mount USB- AlwaysOn feature- AutoLock- Reboot (only for root users!! bootloader, normal or fastboot, confirm dialog)- Battery- Locale- Hotspot Wifi- USB Tether- LockPattern- AudioManager- Lock Screen (turn your screen off)- Direct Shortcut app (All activities or applications)- Haptic feedback- Volume manager (All volumes controls)- Shutdown (Only for root users)- Contact direct call- System info (RAM, CPU, memory usage, SDcard free memory)IMPORTANT NOTES: - For any updates or news you can follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/honoluluteam********** WARNING **********- Read Contact & Call permissions is used to add a "Direct Contact Call" toggle within widget. Without these permissions is impossible to call a contact with one-click.The Read log permission is used into Issue Manager to allow user to send bugs of ONLY Extended Controls app.*****************************

reviews.title: Was Great...
reviews.comment: ... until some update or another messed up it\'s use of power. Now, it\'ll drain a fully charged RAZR MAXX in a matter of hours. With this app disabled, the battery lasts days. Fix this and get your other two stars back.
reviews.author: Kehvan Zydhek

reviews.title: Good app, but things not working as intended
reviews.comment: So far I\'m enjoying many of the features this app has to offer, my issue is, not all of the features are working as intended. I\'m on a Nexus 4, and the USB Tether toggle feature simply does not work. Three stars because I had to shell out money for this despite not getting everything I had paid for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was a great app, please make it great again.
reviews.comment: On my Nexus 4 this was possibly the most useful app.  Now EC will randomly drain my battery for no apparent reason.  Please fix this Dev!  For now though uninstall.
reviews.author: MuHammed Lonon

reviews.title: Caused issues with my phone
reviews.comment: After using this app my phone would freeze completely, I couldn\'t even power off my phone I had to remove the battery to be able to use my phone again. After installing I started to have issues with everything. my phone would move extremely slow and my music apps the volume would just get really low all of a sudden. All of these problems stopped once I uninstalled the app.
reviews.author: Brina S

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: It works great on my Samsung Galaxy S3 running 4.1.2.  Because I live out in rural remote area and work from home my main internet goes out from time to time. When it does I turn the hotspot on and use that. It is nice because I don\'t have to pay extra money to Verizon.
reviews.author: Jason Bloomer

reviews.title: Great but eats battery
reviews.comment: This really is a great app but after noticing my battery drain a lot quicker I checked and it is taking 20% from a full charge on my Nexus 4! It seems to be a bug looking at the other reviews but will have to uninstall.
reviews.author: Ryan Steddy

reviews.title: Autolock toggle STILL doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: The autolock toggle still doesn\'t work on Evo LTE with ICS, despite what recent updates say. Update:1 year later and Autolock toggle still doesn\'t work. Waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One touch hotspot for tethering to Nexus 7.
reviews.comment: I needed the ability to easily activate WiFi hotspot to tether my Nexus One to my Nexus 7.  Now I have all the capabilities of Jelly Bean without buying a new phone. I added a flashlight toggle to the widget too.
reviews.author: James Wood

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: This is to much money for wahtt It does plus it is always force closing and I\'m not even using it and it force closes when imon skyp the Internet listening to music or on youtube its ao anpying toh ave to push the okay button every 5 min.
reviews.author: Leila Wood

reviews.title: HotSpot still costs for VZW users
reviews.comment: Based on a review, I got this app specifically to avoid having to sign up (and pay) for VZW\'s fee based HotSpot.  It fails and tells me to call VZW and subscribe so it was pointless for me.    It might be okay for Android geeks, but does nothing that I care about.
reviews.author: Gene Pardee

reviews.title: All working fine
reviews.comment: Latest version works fine across all my devices, ranging from 2.2 to 4.2 devices. Great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Battery killer app
reviews.comment: Not too bad but drains my battery at no time. \"Battery saver\" feature doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Ron Levit

reviews.title: Battery drain problem.
reviews.comment: Just noticed this app is using over 50% of my battery. Please fix. JB 4.2.2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This App Is What You\'re Looking For...
reviews.comment: This app is phenomenal, it works perfectly. No other words to describe it. fantastic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Working perfect
reviews.comment: This is hands down \"the best control widget\" anyone could want. With well over 30 toggles, leaving nothing out! (Edit) l had to add how pleased l am with the addition of the \"quick control bar\" in the slide down menu. Now l can turn both my 4g LTE & my WiFi Hotspot on and off [I use those just as much as WiFi/BT/ the Note ll has] without having to leave the note/page/game, that I\'m using! Perfection.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: The most unstable app I\'ve ever used. Crashes several times a day. It even crashes other apps such as my camera.
reviews.author: Mike Hunt

reviews.title: Whack
reviews.comment: Many issues to this app.  The volume control doesn\'t work in ICS OR JB.  Pressing the GPS button changes the brightness and brings up the volume control.  This is all through the GS2, One S and now I have the One X. Too many other issues to type out. Please update asap. Uninstalled for now
reviews.author: Leon Reid

reviews.title: Good/bad
reviews.comment: Excellent widget that I\'ve been using for years. But since jelly bean it\'s been killing my battery :( otherwise five stars
reviews.author: Hassan Ghani

reviews.comment: It\'s a cool widget, but it won\'t reboot (shutdown works fine) on my vodafone 845 :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Battery drainer
reviews.comment: Great app, but if you have 4.1+ on your phone forget it, the app drains my battery in no time now. Please fix!
reviews.author: Arjan Vermeulen
